title: Looking for friends ^^
body:
Hi everyone, my name's _Aerie_... I mean IRL and ingame too x) 


I would love to find other players like me, that are pretty new. I'm on vacation at the moment and stuck at home because I had an accident (nothing serious, just can't walk for at least a month =_=). Anyways, I'm level 22, I'm pretty good at poking/teamfights champions. My two favourites remain **Miss Fortune** {{champion:21}}  and **Karma** {{champion:43}} . I'm told to be a decent and respectful player. I'm from New Caledonia and am wondering if there other Caledonian players on here? I speak French, Spanish and English (French is my mother tongue). There you go! Add me if you want to have fun with me, we might even become good friends who knows?

Xoxo {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

_**Aerie**_

replies.body:
Well hello there Aerie
Evan here
I'm not really good at this but ok lmao
Just add meh in game if you wanna be friends :D -Hypnotits {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Haha I loled at your summoner name x) I just added you! See you around!

Hello Aerie,

My game name is Mutley. (yes I do accept being called Mut.) My IRL name is Adrian Jenkins and I'm pretty new to the multiplayer games such as League of Legends with only 2 year of experience. I speak English primarily but I understand basic Mandarin and I'm learning Korean at the moment.

I'm a 16 year old male Summoner from Murray Bridge I'm currently in Silver V 0lp and I play Support and top lane (prefer tank Champions {{champion:412}} {{champion:150}} are my favorites.) I can play almost any night expect Wednesdays. and every second weekend.

I hope you recover well from your accident and I'm glad it's not a serious injury.

If you want to add me my name is **Mutley** and I wish you best of luck on the field of Justice known as Summoners Rift.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Thank you for replying :) I'll add you immediately! Let's have a game together soon, I might learn new things now :)

im playing a fair bit of normals these days since preseason.

love to play with u sometimes :)
Hey there Bribery, I just added you as a friend, see you on the rift! :)
